pullrequest.title: Proposal for custom elements and attributes

content.raw:
nit \(minor\) This sounds a bit pessimistic… Perhaps rewording to:

“Since these features and their corresponding parameters may start out specific to each application, it may make more sense to make a custom extension rather than trying to immediately try to extend the existing SDFormat specification.”

or something like that?
